snippet.title: Realms Deep 2022: Nightmare Reaper | Console Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Join our newsletter to be notified once the game launches on consoles: https://www.feardemic-games.com/newsletter-signup
Nightmare Reaper is a part of Realms Deep 2022! This is a great moment to announce the game is coming to PS4, PS5, Xbox Series X, and Nintendo Switch in early 2023!

Nightmare Reaper is a dark and violent meld of retro and modern action games, inspired by the classic 2.5D first-person shooters of the 90s, with elements of modern looter shooters and roguelites.

FEATURES
💥 Music and audio by the great Andrew Hulshult.
💥 Non-intrusive but mysterious story.
💥 Many game modes.
💥 A mix of manual and random level generation.
💥 Tons of random events and secrets.

More info about Nightmare Reaper on:
WEBSITE - https://www.feardemic-games.com
NEWSLETTER - https://www.feardemic-games.com/newsletter-signup
STEAM - https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/feardemic
DISCORD - https://discord.com/invite/uD74XrcfQq
TWITTER - https://twitter.com/feardemic
FACEBOOK - https://www.facebook.com/Feardemic
INSTAGRAM - https://www.instagram.com/feardemic
TIKTOK - https://www.tiktok.com/@feardemic
TWITCH - https://www.twitch.tv/feardemic
